meanings.definition: To utter a short, sharp cry or bark.
meanings.sent1: The puppy was yelping for attention.
meanings.sent2: The dog kept yelping until its owner came home.
meanings.sent3: The yelping of the little dog made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The yelping of the squirrel echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The yelping sound was like a tiny alarm clock ringing.

meanings.definition: A short, sharp cry or bark.
meanings.sent1: The yelping of the puppy woke up the whole house.
meanings.sent2: I heard a yelping noise coming from the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The yelping of the small dog sounded like a squeaky toy.
meanings.sent4: The yelping of the coyote filled the night with eerie sounds.
meanings.sent5: The yelping of the puppy was music to my ears.
